values.description: orders the products and categories based on hisotrical data and sales insights
orders based on maximum individual and aggregate commission that can be earned
order based on the stock available in the inventory
recommends those that were historically brought together with current cart products
recommends based on which product is giving maximum profit
recommends based on which product is overstocked
shipping cost of products where shipping is handled in-house is waived off
shipping cost of all products including third-party handled is waived off
